original_title: Onyx the Fortuitous and the Talisman of Souls
overview: Onyx joins a group of fellow occultists to attend a dark ritual at the mansion of their idol, Bartok. Suspecting Bartokâ€™s nefarious intentions, Onyx is suddenly immersed in a world of monsters, mystery, and mayhem.
tagline: Demons. Ghouls. Tiny wines. Onyx is in for one hell of a weekend.
title: Onyx the Fortuitous and the Talisman of Souls
